title: Twelve: Emily's Story
description: Emily Henderson has lived life to the fullest extent. Off-the-cuff, no regrets, no fear and she never looks back. Ever. She's a risk taker; a thrill seeker. Her favorite saying is, "Life is short you gotta live a little." In the end we only regret the chances we didn't take. From the early age of twelve Emily vowed to never let her guard down. She learned the hard way that if you open up your heart to people it only led to getting hurt. Friendship, lovers it didn’t matter. If feelings got in the way then the chances of getting your broken was inevitable. Then Raul, Liam’s bodyguard, starting flirting with Emily out of the blue. Raul’s past life as a mercenary has led him to lead a life void of emotion so luckily, he wants the same thing Emily wants; a no-strings attached relationship. Will they be able to keep their relationship from becoming the inevitable? Or, will they be able to continue a life void of feelings and commitment.
author: L. Sommers
